Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: backgroundColor
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Sets the background layer to the specified color

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: blur
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Applies Gaussian blur

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: brightness
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Increases or decreases the image brightness

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: contrast
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Increases or decreases the image contrast

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: convolution
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Runs a convolution matrix (or kernel) on the image

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: equalize
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Equalizes the color distribution in the image

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: extractFocalPoints
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Use focal points when converting the image

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: filling
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Returns an image sized exactly as requested wherever is its ratio by

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: focal
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Adds a focal point to be used in later transforms

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: format
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Specifies the output format of the image

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: grayScale
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Converts the image to grayscale

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: maxBytes
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Degrades the quality of the image until the image is under the

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: noUpscale
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Prevents thumbor from upscaling images

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: noise
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Adds noise to the image

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: quality
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Changes the overall quality of the JPEG image (does nothing for PNGs

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: rgb
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Changes the amount of color in each of the three channels

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: rotate
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Rotates the image

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: roundCorners
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Adds rounded corners to the image

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: sharpen
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Enhances apparent sharpness of the image

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: stripICC
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Removes any ICC information

Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.name: watermark
Classes/Bumbo/Filter.html#/s:FOC5Bumbo5B.abstract: Adds a watermark image on top of the original

Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html#/s:FCC5Bumbo5.name: meta(_:)
Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html#/s:FCC5Bumbo5.abstract: Meta provides data regarding the image processing operations that would be performed.

Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html#/s:FCC5Bumbo5.name: trim(_:)
Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html#/s:FCC5Bumbo5.abstract: Trim will select the appropriate corner to trim.

Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html#/s:FCC5Bumbo5.name: crop(leftTop:rightBottom:)
Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html#/s:FCC5Bumbo5.abstract: Crop will define which area of the image should be cropped before resizing and filtering.

Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html#/s:FCC5Bumbo5.name: fitIn(_:)
Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html#/s:FCC5Bumbo5.abstract: Fit in specifies that the image should not be auto-cropped, but auto-resized.

Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html#/s:FCC5Bumbo5.name: filter(_:)
Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html#/s:FCC5Bumbo5.abstract: Filter adds a filter to the list of processing filters.

Classes/Bumbo/HorizontalAlign.html#/s:FO.name: left
Classes/Bumbo/HorizontalAlign.html#/s:FO.abstract: Keeps the left side and trims the right side

Classes/Bumbo/HorizontalAlign.html#/s:FO.name: center
Classes/Bumbo/HorizontalAlign.html#/s:FO.abstract: Keeps the middle and trims both sides

Classes/Bumbo/HorizontalAlign.html#/s:FO.name: right
Classes/Bumbo/HorizontalAlign.html#/s:FO.abstract: Keeps the right side and trims the left side

Classes/Bumbo/VerticalAlign.html#/s:FOC5.name: top
Classes/Bumbo/VerticalAlign.html#/s:FOC5.abstract: Keeps the top and trims the bottom

Classes/Bumbo/VerticalAlign.html#/s:FOC5.name: middle
Classes/Bumbo/VerticalAlign.html#/s:FOC5.abstract: Keeps the middle and trims both top and bottom

Classes/Bumbo/VerticalAlign.html#/s:FOC5.name: bottom
Classes/Bumbo/VerticalAlign.html#/s:FOC5.abstract: Keeps the bottom and trims the top

Classes/Bumbo.html#/s:ZFC5Bumbo5Bumbo9co.name: configure(host:secretKey:)
Classes/Bumbo.html#/s:ZFC5Bumbo5Bumbo9co.abstract: Setup Thumbor server with host and secret key.

Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html.name: Builder
Classes/Bumbo/Builder.html.abstract: A builder used to apply settings and filters.

Classes.html.name: Classes
Classes.html.abstract: The following classes are available globally.
